name: Ocean Jewel Dicover
description:
Ocean Jewel Dicover is an addictive diamond jewels game. Playing the game, you will join in an exciting adventure to find the lost jewels in deep oceans, all oceans on the world.
Features of Diamond Ocean
- The game is totally free
- There re over 300+ exciting levels
- Match 4 jewels to win the jewel's bomb and 1 lighting.
- Use the lightning jewel can eliminate jewels in one row.
- Match 5 jewels to win color-changing jewels and 2 lightings.
- Use the timing bonus can extend the playing time.
